name: 360° MICROSCOPE
description:
The bacterial experiment is about to run amok! The only thing that can stop it is the patented Microscopic Laser Gun, but it can only fire once every 10 seconds. Orbit the field and eliminate germs before they multiply out of control.

Controls:

Aim with your mouse

Left click to freeze

Right click to shoot the LASER.

Credits:

- heckbringer - programming

- adhesion - music, sound design, programming

- brendo - art, programming
